title: Thinking Fast and Slow - primary purpose

content.prompt: The primary purpose of the passage is to

choices.label: discredit a theory accepted by most psychologists
reveal a gap in the current state of psychological research
indicate concerns about the rise of emotional decision making

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
